text: Race for the Yankee Zephyr (also known as Treasure of the Yankee Zephyr) is a 1981 New Zealand Australian action adventure movie directed by David Hemmings and starring Ken Wahl, Lesley Ann Warren, George Peppard, Donald Pleasence, Bruno Lawrence, Grant Tilly. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 action movies Category:1981 adventure movies Category:New Zealand action movies Category:New Zealand adventure movies Category:Australian action movies Category:Australian adventure movies
title: Race for the Yankee Zephyr
